entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
